title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 20.5 - Commissions from an hmo
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 20.5 - Commissions from an hmo

State Regulations

Any insurance broker accepting a commission, compensation, fee or allowance from a health maintenance organization (HMO), as defined in section
52.2
(w) of this Title (Regulation 62), as authorized by 10 NYCRR
98.11
(o) and section
52.42
(e) of this Title, shall maintain and furnish to the HMO, upon request, all information concerning its arrangements with participating employers. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
20.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
